## MarkerTechniqueParams.iconIsOptional property

If true, the text will appear even if the icon cannot be rendered because of missing icon graphics. Defaults to `true`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
iconIsOptional?: boolean;
```
